channel.title: help! I lost my workstation password
channel.description:
i need help i lost my workstation password and i dont know what to do! im using kvm
i cant install software because of this! any way to fix other than full reinstall?? please help me

item.title: help! I lost my workstation password
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
This can certainly be fixed. No full reinstall needed.

Thereâ€™s no specific documentation on this topic.

This could be resolved as per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle. Same as if running Debian inside a VM.

Read full topic
